paragraph.paragraph: All projects must reside within a vxconVisualStudioSolutionsProjects 0 Solution . The way projects are adding in Visual Studio .NET depends on the pre-existence of a solution. When no solution exists, new projects can only be created. This will create a new solution and place the project inside the newly created solution. When a solution already exists, create a new project will close the active solution and all of its contained projects. vxurfNewProjectDialog 0 New Project Dialog does provide the Add to Solution option to prevent the active vxconVisualStudioSolutionsProjects 0 Solution from being closed and instead adds the newly created project to the already opened solution. New projects can be create using the File, New, Project menu. You can also add projects to already opened vxconVisualStudioSolutionsProjects 0 Solution s using the File, Add Project, New Project menu.

One of the areas where EiffelEnvision project creation differs from other language's project templates in Visual Studio .NET is after a project has been created. EiffelEnvision provides rich ../../code_browsing/index.xmlCode Browsing and Navigation facilities to assist in development and maintenance of Eiffel code. As such, an initial ../../compiling_projects/index.xmlBuild is launched. The process should take between 5 and 30 seconds, depending on your system configuration. The initial build will also make subsequent compilations faster.
